item.title: [RBX6][Dedicated Servers] - 46L04 - 46K03 - 46N03 - 46L08 - 46K05
item.description:
May 16, 01:19 UTC
Resolved - Start Time : 15/05/2023 21:17 UTC
End Time : 16/05/2023 01:18 UTC
Root cause : Cooling system issue.
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

May 16, 00:34 UTC
Update - Most of the affected servers are operational now. Our technical teams are working on the others.

May 15, 22:26 UTC
Identified - Start time : 15/05/2023 21:17 UTC
Service impact : Some servers are currently unreachable.
Root cause : Cooling system issue.
Ongoing actions : Our teams are working on this issue.

item.title: VPS - GRA1 GRA4 - switch gra-z1c58-a70
item.description:
May 15, 23:03 UTC

May 15, 22:38 UTC
Investigating - Estimated time to recovery : 1 hour(s)

Affected switches

gra-z1c58-a70

Affected racks

G212A04

Affected hosts
